item.title: App Accessibility Review drop in session
item.description: Included for free with every Swift Leeds ticket, an app accessibility review drop-in session gives you an exclusive 1 on 1 feedback session with two leading iOS accessibility experts.
item.dc:creator: Rob Whitaker

item.title: My tips on making effective tech presentations
item.description: I have had the opportunity to speak in public, presenting my thoughts on tech in many settings— from the most incredible tech conferences, to online courses, and small workshops. I’ve also attended countless talks at meetups and conferences, both in the tech world and outside.
item.dc:creator: Rob Whitaker
